welcome_message_body: Welcome to Round Lake Beach, where the charm of our small town meets the beauty of our lakes. Explore our vibrant community and enjoy the tranquility of our natural surroundings. We're thrilled to have you here!

restaurants.name: Sammie's
restaurants.description: Sammie's is a hot dog joint located in Round Lake Beach.
restaurants.address: 215 W Rollins Rd (Cedar Lake Rd.), Round Lake Beach, IL 60073

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Memorial Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport houses all arrival and departure gates, as well as various shops and restaurants for travelers to enjoy.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport is reserved for VIP and private jet travelers, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines and Air Canada

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Alaska Airlines, and other airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves international flights for various airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport
